md-to-docx.description: Convert Markdown to DOCX using pandoc.

md-to-docx-pdf.description: Convert Markdown to DOCX, then DOCX to PDF with fallbacks.

exitCodes.10: MD_READ_FAIL – input markdown missing or invalid arguments
exitCodes.20: DOCX_FAIL – pandoc or DOCX conversion failure
exitCodes.40: FALLBACK_TRIGGERED – a fallback path succeeded (non-primary route)
